data.title: 60 NEW HISTORIC TEAMS IN ONLY ONE ROSTER NBA2K20

data.meta_description: Hello from Brazil. I did 60 new classic teams and completed the classic teams that already existed in the game. Look for the new teams in ALL TIME
data.text:
Rookie

OVR: 0

Join Date: Sep 2014

60 NEW HISTORIC TEAMS IN ONLY ONE ROSTER NBA2K20

Hello from Brazil.

I did 60 new classic teams and completed the classic teams that already existed in the game.

Look for the new teams in ALL TIME TEAMS and CURRENT TEAMS. Some players have the wrong photos but the correct players are present in each team roster.

My name on PS4 is Peregrino1978

Roster's name is: 60 New Historic Teams. This is for NBA 2K20.

Below is the list of teams.

1. Dallas Mavericks 1987-1988 (all time team)

Mark Aguirre, Rolando Blackman, Derek Harper, Brad Davis, Bill Wenninghton, Sam Perkins, Detlef Schremp, James Donaldson  Roy Tarpley, Steve Alford, Uwe Blab, Jim Farmer (4 new players)

2. Dallas Mavericks 2003-2004 (current team)

Dirk, Steve Nash, Michael Finley, Antoine Walker, Antawn Jamison, Shawn Bradley, Eduardo Najera, Scott Williams - Travis Best, Tony Delk, Danny Fortson, Josh Howard (4 new players)

3. SPURS 1989-1990 (all time team)

David Robinson, Rod Strickland, Johnny Moore, Frank Brickowski, Maurice Cheeks, Terry Cummings, Caldwell Jones, Sean Elliott, Vernon Maxwell, Reggie Williams, David Wingate  Uwe Blab, Willie Anderson (2 new players)

4. SPURS 1994-1995 (current team)

David Robinson, Dennis Rodman, Moses Malone, Doc Rivers, Terry Cummings, Vinny Del Negro, Sean Elliot, Avery Johnson, Chuck Person, Howard Eisley  Willie Anderson, Jack Haley (2 new players)

5. INDIANA PACERS 1999-2000 (all time team)

Mark Jackson, Jalen Rose, Rik Smits, Al Harringhton, Sam Perkins, Chris Mullin  Reggie Miller, Dale Davis, Travis Beest, Jeff Foster, Austin Croshere, Derrick McKey (6 new players)

6. INDIANA PACERS 2004-2005 (current team)

Stephen Jackson, Jermaine O´Neal, Scot Pollard  Reggie Miller, Ron Artest, Austin Croshere, Jeff Foster, Dale Davis, Anthony Johnson, Fred Jones, Jamaal Tinsley, James Jones(9 new players)

7. LAKERS 1981-1982 (all time team)

Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Michael Cooper, Magic Johnson, Norm Nixon, Jamaal Wilkes, Bob McAdoo, Kurt Rambis  Eddie Jordan, Mitch Kupchack, Mike Mgee, Mark Landsberg, Jim Brewer (5 New players)

8. LAKERS 2008-2009 (current team)

Kobe Bryant, Pau Gasol, Derek Fisher, Trevor Ariza, Luke Walton  Andrew Bynum, Lamar Odom, Jordan Farmar, Radmanovic, Sasha Vujacic, Shannon Brown, DJ. Mbenga (7 new players)

9. BUCKS 1981-1982 (all time team)

Marques Johnson, Sidney Moncrief, Junior Bridgeman, Bob Lanier, Brian Winters, Alton Lister, , Bob Dandridge, Havey Catchings - Mike Evans, , Pat Cummings, Scott May, Quinn Buckner, Geoff Crompton (5 new players)

10. BUCKS 2000-2001 (current team)

Ray Allen, Sam Cassell, Darvin Ham, Lindsey Hunter, Ervin Johnson, Jerome Kersey, Michaell Redd, Scott Williams - Rafer Allston, Jason Caffey, Glenn Robinson, Tim Thomas (4 new players)
